name: ACupFullofHappy
0:
”Alexa, open A Cup Full of Happy”
”Alexa, launch A Cup Full of Happy”
”Alexa, start A Cup Full of Happy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a cup full of happy
des:
We all want to be happy. What makes us happy can vary from moment to moment, day to day. Sometimes we just need something to chuckle about. Other times we might need a bit of inspiration. Or maybe we just want to learn about a new habit that might help us enjoy more happiness. It could be that we need some positivity in our day.

A Cup Full of Happy, created by The Good News Cafe, fulfills all these needs. check it out and fill up YOUR cup full of happy every day!

Visit our blog, www.thegoodnewscafe.net for general upbeat focus and inspiration.
